column1: Little Goat Diner////- The wait: Despite having a 7pm reservation and checking in 5 min prior
column2: we had to wait 20 minutes to be seated. It seemed like many of those around us were in the same boat. The host at the front offered to comp a drink for us each
column3: but my friend and I did not want to drink. He offered instead to comp some appetizers for us to be ready when we finally got seated
column4: but these never showed up. The restaurant did give us a free dessert at the end of our meal
column5: but it was ice cream and I am lactose intolerant... Thanks.
